misc: Famous for being an ambassador for the AimPoint method for putting.
biography: Timo, a celebrated figure from Keimola Golf, is renowned not only for his prowess on the course but also for his engaging personality. He is also well known for his ambassadorship for the AimPoint method for putting.

With 8 past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Timo has become a familiar and respected competitor. His dedication to the sport is evident in every swing, reflecting a deep commitment to golf and its community.

Timo's impressive record includes 3 victories at the Hector Trophée, marking him as a formidable player in pair formats. Although he has yet to secure an individual Victor trophy, his consistent performance demonstrates his skill.

While Timo is not scheduled to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, his legacy in the tournament remains strong. Fans and fellow competitors alike will keenly feel his absence, though a last-minute change could always bring him back into the fold.
